## initialize() function

Initialize the Mod API.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function initialize(onLoaded: OnLoadCallback): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  onLoaded | <code>OnLoadCallback</code> | Callback when the mod API is initialized and ready to be interacted with. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`

## Example


```
Spotfire.initialize(async (api) => {
 console.log("Mod API loaded.");
});

```
